title: Mariupol's dead put at 5000 as Ukraine braces in the east - The Associated Press
content: Mariupol's dead put at 5000 as Ukraine braces in the east  The Associated PressView Full Coverage on Google News
description: ANDRIIVKA, Ukraine (AP) â€” The mayor of the besieged port city of Mariupol put the number of civilians killed there at more than 5,000 Wednesday, as Ukraine collected evidence of Russian atrocities on the ruined outskirts of Kyiv and braced for what could become a climactic battle for control of the country's industrial east.
